name: 2.7 Light Years Away
description:
Mako is challenging herself to reach the greatest distance she can managing the ship modules to dodge and neutralize enemies' attacks!
Right, up, left and down arrows are used to activate each of the four modules.

Use WASD to move the ship. Be careful, activating modules and even basic movements produce heat, overheating the ship damages it!

Right module, guns: destroy asteroids and kill enemies.

Top module, shields: protect against heavy attacks (not implemented)

Left module, roll: dodge bullets.

Bottom module, hyper speed: travel faster and make more points!

Music: Fire Darer - Sawsquarenoise
